title: Simple Bilan Usage - Veo 3 Prompts
style: photorealistic, minimalist, clean aesthetic, bright natural lighting

scene_1_add_powder.prompt: A cinematic macro shot of white electrolyte powder being spooned into a clear sports bottle. The powder cascades down in slow motion, showing its fine texture. Minimalist modern kitchen background with bright natural lighting. Clean aesthetic, photorealistic, 16:9 format.

scene_2_mix.prompt: Crystal clear water is poured into a sports bottle containing white powder, creating a swirling vortex. The bottle is sealed and shaken vigorously in slow motion, showing the liquid mixing and dissolving. Bright natural lighting, minimalist kitchen setting. Dynamic and refreshing, photorealistic, 16:9 format.

scene_3_drink.prompt: A person takes a refreshing drink from a clear sports bottle filled with electrolyte water. Their face shows satisfaction and refreshment. Bright natural light in a minimalist modern environment. Clean aesthetic, calm and revitalizing mood, photorealistic, 16:9 format.

combined_single_video.prompt: Three scenes showing electrolyte drink preparation: 1) White powder being spooned into a clear sports bottle in slow motion, 2) Water poured and bottle shaken vigorously creating a swirling vortex, 3) A person drinking from the bottle with a refreshed expression. Minimalist modern kitchen, bright natural lighting, clean aesthetic, photorealistic, 16:9 format.

notes: Use the separate scene prompts if you want more control over each shot
Use the combined prompt for a single continuous video
Each scene is designed to be simple and easy to generate with Veo 3
No text overlays in the prompts - add those in post-production if needed
